about_the_game:
Whether you are a seasoned fly caster or someone wanting to learn this graceful art, get ready to immerse yourself in the challenge of casting the perfect fly.

Explore visually stunning environments that transport you right to the water. Much time and attention has been spent ensuring that the entire experience mimics the real feeling and physics of how a fly line and rod respond.

With a real-time day cycle and varying temperatures, different techniques and flies will be needed to outsmart the trout. Trout are fussy and you'll need to make sure your technique is spot on!

Customize your gear with different skins and patterns. Unlock upgrades and locations as you progress and see if you can make it to the top of the leaderboard.


NB: This game requires a virtual reality headset. Please note, we have tested on Vive and Quest. If you have any issues with your device please post in discord or the community tab and we will be sure to help address any issues.

This is an evolving product and we would really appreciate your feedback. Please engage via email, discord or the community tab and tell us the good, the bad, and everything else.

short_description: Fly fishing is not like ordinary fishing. Learning to cast a fly is a sport all on it's own. It's challenging, it's rewarding and it's a thing of beauty when done well. Once you've mastered fly fishing there's no going back.
